verses.name: Ephesians 6:11
verses.text: Put on the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil.

verses.name: Ephesians 6:12
verses.text: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, against spiritual wickedness in high places.

verses.name: Ephesians 6:13
verses.text: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day, and having done all, to stand.

verses.name: Ephesians 6:14
verses.text: Stand therefore, having your loins girt about with truth, and having on the breastplate of righteousness;
